about_the_game:
By using these services you will be able to enhance the travel speed of special units and to achieve even faster science studies for 1 month (30 days).

This package includes:
  • Explorer missions duration -50%
  • Merchant missions duration -50%
  • Alchemist science studies in all estates +25%
detailed_description:
